sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Vendome Acquisition Corporation I(NasdaqGM: VNME) added to NASDAQ Composite Index
feed.summary: Vendome Acquisition Corporation I (NasdaqGM: VNME) has been added to the NASDAQ Composite Index. This news follows a recent announcement where the company received $2.648 million in funding. The company operates in the Investment Holding Companies sector.
